lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You know what, maybe I'll just pace myself and take today off.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Ahh, this isn't half bad. I think I can get use to this peace and quiet.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: LOCKE!!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: AHHH! WHO'S THERE-

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Oh, it's just you. What brings you here, Keyna?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Don't play dumb, you know exactly why I'm here!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I'm trying to run a professional detective agency unlike SOME people.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: So would you care to explain these flyers around town advertising my business as a COUPLE COUNSELING business?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hey, I have clients! ...Most of the time.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Don't try to change the subject.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I've never seen these flyers in my life!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Really now? I asked Fedelynn and there is video evidence from the neighborhood security cameras.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: So this picture of a shady redhead with an oversized trenchcoat doesn't happen to be you?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Can't say I recognize this handsome stranger.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Alright alright, stop glaring! You're boring holes into my coat.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Lighten up, will ya? It's free publicity!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It's like they say, come for the misunderstanding, stay for the quality detective-ing.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Surely, your rising star reputation could do for more of that, right?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Locke, couples have been knocking on my door for a week now, and none of them were in need of a consulting detective.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well I'm sure your detective genius could have dealt with all kinds of consulting.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Do I look like I know the first thing about relationships?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Uhh... Is that a trick question?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I've never been in one in my life!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wait, seriously?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Well there's stuff I'll have to mention, and not everyone handles it well...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Ahh, right.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well if it makes you feel better, I've never been in a relationship either.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: That's a given.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: HEY!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: The life of a detective is a hard one. I gotta keep my loved ones out of danger.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: YOUR danger just means getting scratched by cats or scolded by the police.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Anyways, you better help me deal with couples!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wait... Don't tell me...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You actually said yes to consulting ALL those couples?!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: How can I refuse? I-I don't have the heart to turn them down.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I tried to give some advice but...

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Oh I just hope that they didn't take it all to heart...

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: This is all your fault!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ME?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well, I mean it is. But I seriously thought you would just say no and turn them away.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Well, I have 5 groups waiting on me right now and you're coming with me this instant!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Let's see how your "detective genius" fares with couple advice.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Woah, hey! Quit grabbin' my arm!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: And I expect all your flyers gone from town by tomorrow!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It took me three days to put those up!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Well you got one.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: So much for my rest day...
